title: Client Request: Skin Listing
body:
When I was only trying to get one skin per champion, knowing which skins I owned was, well, easy. But because of mystery gifting, I am finding that I'm having to keep an outside notebook listing of skins I have for "coordinating" with teams. I know, I'm probably the only player who even cares. It would be nice to be able to see what skins I owned, and perhaps which champs I don't even have skins for before champ select and without having to go into each champion's page to see whats "owned". I play with a few different groups of people and half the fun is coordinating our picks so that we have matching, similar, or "all" skins.

Am I really unique or are there others out there who care as much as I do?

NOTE: Why is there no longer a "client feedback" board? Am I missing it?

replies.body:
Are you referring to Skins > Selecting Show All > Sort By Champions, or are you referring to something else?

EDIT: I realized this only shows skins that are currently available. D:
I mean in my profile. We have a way to view champions we own - is it possible to have a view that also shows us what skins?

> [{quoted}](name=Eitan Leigh,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=6d3WPYEt,comment-id=00020001,timestamp=2015-01-08T06:14:14.489+0000)
>
> I mean in my profile. We have a way to view champions we own - is it possible to have a view that also shows us what skins?

Ah, gotcha. So, rather than clicking through each champion, you'd rather have it in list form?
You hit the nail on that one, this would be awesome, I own all champions and don't know which I have skins for or not.

Yes, that's exactly what we'd like.  I've been thinking the same thing, and was basically 'forced' to use an outside site(The Elophant mentioned above), as it was the only way I could find to do it.  

One of those things that gets overlooked, and you end up wondering why it wasn't always there lol
Bingo! We have ways to go this for champions and runes, making skins the odd purchasable out.

Yes, this is exactly what I mean! I have a mac so I can't use the afore mentioned program, but I have been using Evernote and a table within it. It's a bit of a pain to go back and forth. Doable, but not fun.

maybe a new section in "my profile" on the website will be more easy to do.

For exemple, you put all champ owned and, when press on them, open a window with the skin you have for the one selected

Another possibility, put the champ in a column and the skin owned at the right of them
I'm pretty sure he means skins that you own, not skins available for purchase. Currently, unless I'm blind, there is no way to quickly and easily obtain a list of skins owned.

If I had to guess that the OP is thinking like I do, not quite that lol

We want a list, like an actual LISTING of all skins we own, so we can check and see what skins we currently own, rather than having to click each individual champ in the profile tab.
Yes! That's what I'm asking for :)

I know it's a bit of an inconvenience but you can download Elophant.  It has a page where you may check all of your owned skins.  

ex:  http://www.elophant.com/league-of-legends/summoner/na/43247262/skins

Also has achievements. :D
